title: US accuses countries forgetting its own use of Cluster Bombs and WMDs
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – “Military men are just dumb stupid animals to be used as pawns in foreign policy.” – Henry Kissinger. America cries ‘bring down dictators’ little forgetting that they vote for Presidents who do not think twice about ordering use of chemicals upon entire villages and wiping out the natives of…
